languages.text: "И это говорит мне бабочка, что сама трепыхается в сетях Темного города". {n}Печальная полуулыбка касается тонких губ эльдарки.{/n} "Я буду рядом, элантах. И поддержу тебя в предстоящих испытаниях, если ты того пожелаешь".

traits.locale_text: "И это говорит мне бабочка, что сама трепыхается в сетях Темного Города". {n}Печальная полуулыбка касается тонких губ эльдарки.{/n} "Я буду рядом, элантах. И поддержу тебя в предстоящих испытаниях, если ты того пожелаешь".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "So says a butterfly struggling in the Dark City's web." {n}Yrliet's thin lips curve into a half-smile.{/n} "I will be close, elantach. And I will support you in the coming trials if you choose to let me."
languages.original_text: "И это говорит мне бабочка, что сама трепыхается в сетях Темного города". {n}Печальная полуулыбка касается тонких губ эльдарки.{/n} "Я буду рядом, элантах. И поддержу тебя в предстоящих испытаниях, если ты того пожелаешь".

traits.locale_text: "So says a butterfly struggling in the Dark City's web." {n}Yrliet's thin lips curl in a half-smile.{/n} "I will be close, elantach. And will support you in the upcoming trials if you choose to let me."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So says a butterfly struggling in the Dark City's web." {n}Yrliet's thin lips curl in a half-smile.{/n} "I will be close, elantach. And will support you in the upcoming trials if you choose to let me."

traits.locale_text: "So says a butterfly struggling in the Dark City's web." {n}Yrliet's thin lips curve into a half-smile.{/n} "I will be close, elantach. And I will support you in the coming trials if you choose to let me."

traits.locale_text: "So says a butterfly struggling in the Dark City's web." {n}Yrliet's thin lips curve into a half-smile.{/n} "I will be close, elantach. And I will support you in the coming trials if you choose to let me."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So says a butterfly struggling in the Dark City's web." {n}Yrliet's thin lips curve into a half-smile.{/n} "I will be close, elantach. And I will support you in the coming trials if you choose to let me."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “一只在黑暗之城的罗网中挣扎的蝴蝶如是说道。”{n}伊莉耶特薄薄的嘴唇露出了微笑。{/n}“我会与你同行，外界人。如果你愿意，我会在接下来的考验中援助你。”
languages.original_text: "So says a butterfly struggling in the Dark City's web." {n}Yrliet's thin lips curve into a half-smile.{/n} "I will be close, elantach. And I will support you in the coming trials if you choose to let me."

traits.locale_text: “一只在黑暗之城的罗网中挣扎的蝴蝶如是说道。”{n}伊莉耶特薄薄的嘴唇露出了微笑。{/n}“我会与你同行，外界人。如果你愿意，我会在接下来的考验中援助你。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "So says a butterfly struggling in the Dark City's web." {n}Yrliet's thin lips curve into a half-smile.{/n} "I will be close, elantach. And I will support you in the coming trials if you choose to let me."

languages.text: «Eso dice la mariposa que se retuerce en la telaraña de la Ciudad Siniestra». {n}Los labios delgados de Yrliet se curvan en una media sonrisa.{/n} «Estaré cerca, elantach, y te apoyaré en las adversidades que están por venir si me lo permites».
languages.original_text: "So says a butterfly struggling in the Dark City's web." {n}Yrliet's thin lips curve into a half-smile.{/n} "I will be close, elantach. And I will support you in the coming trials if you choose to let me."

traits.locale_text: «Eso dice la mariposa que se retuerce en la telaraña de la Ciudad Siniestra». {n}Los labios delgados de Yrliet se curvan en una media sonrisa.{/n} «Estaré cerca, elantach, y te apoyaré en las adversidades que están por venir si me lo permites».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「仄暗き都の網の中で奮闘している蝶がそう言っている」{n}ユリエットの薄い唇がかすかに笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「我は近くにいよう、エランタ。お前が我を選ぶなら、来るべき試練でお前を支えよう」
languages.original_text: "So says a butterfly struggling in the Dark City's web." {n}Yrliet's thin lips curve into a half-smile.{/n} "I will be close, elantach. And I will support you in the coming trials if you choose to let me."

traits.locale_text: 「仄暗き都の網の中で奮闘している蝶がそう言っている」{n}ユリエットの薄い唇がかすかに笑みを浮かべる。{/n}「我は近くにいよう、エランタ。お前が我を選ぶなら、来るべき試練でお前を支えよう」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Sagt ein Schmetterling, der im Netz der Dunklen Stadt zappelt." {n}Yrliets dünne Lippen formen sich zu einem schwachen Lächeln.{/n} "Ich werde in der Nähe sein, Elantach. Und ich werde Euch in den kommenden Prüfungen unterstützen, wenn Ihr mir das gestattet."
languages.original_text: "So says a butterfly struggling in the Dark City's web." {n}Yrliet's thin lips curve into a half-smile.{/n} "I will be close, elantach. And I will support you in the coming trials if you choose to let me."

traits.locale_text: "Sagt ein Schmetterling, der im Netz der Dunklen Stadt zappelt." {n}Yrliets dünne Lippen formen sich zu einem schwachen Lächeln.{/n} "Ich werde in der Nähe sein, Elantach. Und ich werde Euch in den kommenden Prüfungen unterstützen, wenn Ihr mir das gestattet."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Dit le papillon pris au piège dans la toile de la Cité Crépusculaire, {n}déclare Yrliet avec un demi-sourire.{/n} Je ne serai pas loin, elantach, et je vous apporterai mon soutien lors de ces épreuves si vous me le permettez. »
languages.original_text: "So says a butterfly struggling in the Dark City's web." {n}Yrliet's thin lips curve into a half-smile.{/n} "I will be close, elantach. And I will support you in the coming trials if you choose to let me."

traits.locale_text: « Dit le papillon pris au piège dans la toile de la Cité Crépusculaire, {n}déclare Yrliet avec un demi-sourire.{/n} Je ne serai pas loin, elantach, et je vous apporterai mon soutien lors de ces épreuves si vous me le permettez. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Kara Şehir'in ağlarına takılıp kalan bir kelebeği duyar gibiyim." {n}Yrliet'in dudaklarında hafif bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Yakınlarda olacağım elantach. İzin verdiğin takdirde bizi bekleyen o imtihanlarda sana destek olacağım."
languages.original_text: "So says a butterfly struggling in the Dark City's web." {n}Yrliet's thin lips curve into a half-smile.{/n} "I will be close, elantach. And I will support you in the coming trials if you choose to let me."

traits.locale_text: "Kara Şehir'in ağlarına takılıp kalan bir kelebeği duyar gibiyim." {n}Yrliet'in dudaklarında hafif bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Yakınlarda olacağım elantach ve izin verdiğin takdirde bizi bekleyen o imtihanlarda sana destek olacağım."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
